Schakel |leader_party = [[Christian Democratic Appeal|CDA]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 78.92 |area_land_km2 = 75.78 |area_water_km2 = 3.14 |population_as_of = 1 January, 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 13991 |population_density_km2 = 185 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |latd=51|latm=58|lats=|latNS=N |longd=4|longm=47|longs=|longEW=E |website = [http://www.lopik.nl www.lopik.nl] }} '''Lopik''' ({{pronunciation|Nl-Lopik.ogg}}) is a municipality and a town in the [[Netherlands]], in the province of [[Utrecht (province)|Utrecht]] and close to the river [[Lek_(river)|Lek]]. In the Netherlands, 'Lopik' is often used as a reference to the broadcasting facilities located in the eastern part of the municipality and in neighbouring [[IJsselstein]]. These include the [[Gerbrandy Tower]], a structure that could be considered the tallest tower in Western Europe and during Christmas time the world's largest Christmas tree. ==Population centres == The municipality of Lopik consists of the following cities, towns, villages and/or districts: [[Benschop]], [[Cabauw]], [[Jaarsveld]], Lopik, [[Lopikerkapel]], [[Polsbroek]], [[Polsbroekerdam]], [[Uitweg]], [[Willige Langerak]], [[Zevender]]. ==Notable people born in Lopik== * [[Ton Strien]] (born 1958), politician == References == * Statistics are taken from the [http://www.sdu.nl/staatscourant/gemeentes/gem293u.htm SDU Staatscourant] == External links== {{commons category}} * [http://www.lopik.nl/ Official website] * [http://www.plattegronden.nl/lopik/index.html A map of Lopik] * [http://www.plattegronden.nl/gemeentelopik/index.html A map of the municipality] {{Geographic location | Centre = Lopik | North = [[Oudewater]], [[Montfoort]] | Northeast = [[IJsselstein]] | Southeast = ''[[Lek (river)|Lek]]''<br>[[Vianen]] | South = ''[[Lek (river)|Lek]]''<br>[[Zederik]] ([[South Holland|ZH]]) | Southwest = ''[[Lek (river)|Lek]]''<br>[[Molenwaard]] ([[South Holland|ZH]]) | West = [[Schoonhoven]] ([[South Holland|ZH]]) | Northwest = [[Vlist]] ([[South Holland|ZH]]) }} {{Utrecht Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of Utrecht (province)]] [[Category:Populated places in Utrecht (province)]] {{Utrecht-geo-stub}}
